bINBUx-w6.memHandModelNotes: Infrequent above 5000 ft (hamel 1992).    Conner et. al (2004) identified that indigo bunting abundance steadily decreased as streamside zone width increased beyond 100m.  Applied edge buffer as 120m.  Amy Silvano
